entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:48 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries or snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
